github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commits format: type(scope): description. Types: feat, fix, docs, test, refactor, style. Be specific about wind forecasting changes and reference relevant wind farms (wf1-wf7) when applicable.

github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Generate comprehensive tests for wind power forecasting models including: time series validation, cross-validation with temporal splits, edge cases for extreme weather, and performance regression tests. Follow pytest conventions.
